report.title: Three Milligrams, Eight Hours
report.author: hitman
report.bodytext: 3 mg of 2C-P is awesome, like a good trip for any kind of music, prefer psy, mild visuals, good results from everyone who took a dose of 3mg, 8hrs trip. Mood like good MDMA, makes me talk, laugh, dance, keeps me fresh after the trip, almost better then acid. /n /n During the course I need to eat food and drink water on time to handle the trip and to keep the brain healthy. /n /n 6 mg is psychedelic, 12hrs /n /n 12 mg is also good it's like a 20 hrs trip
